Contractor represents and warrants that it has full capacity and authority to enter into and to perform this Agreement and ac knowledges that IM reserves the right to refuse Contractor Contractor’s personnel access to the Event venue unless and until this Agreement has been signed by an authorised representative of Cont ractor.

comply with all applicable laws, regulations, instructions and requirements relevant to the Event, including but not limit ed to those related to health, safety and security. Without limitation to the foregoing, Contractor shall familiarise itself with, and adhere at all times to, all health, safety and security regulations pertaining to the Event venue and all health, safety and security instructions and requirements as set out in IM IM’s exhibitor manual and/or as otherwise communicated by IM from time to time;

ensure that where build up and/or break down are part of the Services for the Event, such Services shall be completed within the official build up and break down timings as set out in IM IM’s exhibitor manual and/or as otherwise communicated by IM from time to time. Where Contractor fails to adhere to such official build up and/or break down timings it shall incur late working fines, and Contractor shall be further responsible for any additional costs incurred by IM on account of Contractor Contractor’s failure to comply with such timings;
not do or omit to do anything that may cause IM to lose any licence, authority, consent or permission on which it relies f or the purposes of organising and operating the Event.

Contractor acknowledges that if it is in violation of any applicable laws, regulations, instructions and/or requirements as r eferenced in Clause 2(b) above and/or if Contractor fails to adhere to any design and/or sustainability regulations outlined in IM IM’s exhibitor manual as referenced in Clause 2(e) above, IM shall be entitled to give Contractor a verbal warning specifying Contractor Contractor’s default and requiring Contractor to undertake corrective action within a certain timeframe. In the event that Contractor does not undertake such corrective action within the relevant timeframe, IM shall be entitled to require Contractor to cease performance of the Services for the Event with immediate effect and/or issue Contractor with a fine, which shall be immediately payable in full by Contractor to IM. The amount of such fine shall be determined by IM in its sole discretion having regard to the nature of Co ntractorntractor’s violation(s).

To the extent that Contractor wishes to appoint any sub contractor(s) to carry out all or any part of the Services, Contractor shall procure that each such sub contractor shall comply with the terms of this Agreement in the same way and to the same extent that Contractor is obliged to comply with them. Contractor shall be liable to IM for the acts or omissions of each such sub contractor, as if such acts or omissions were Contractor's own acts or omissions.

Contractor shall indemnify and keep indemnified IM from and against any loss, damage, cost, claim or expense suffered or incu rred by IM arising out of or in connection with any: (i) act or omission of Contractor and/or any of its personnel and/or any of its sub contractors in respect of the performance of the Services for the Event, including, without limitation, any loss of or damage to any property or injury/illness to or death of any person resulting therefrom, and (ii) any breach by Contractor and/or any of its personnel and/or any of its sub contractors of any warranty, representation and/or undertaking set out in this Agreement.

This Agreement and any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with it or its subject matter or formation shall be g overned by and construed in accordance with laws of IM IM’s country of incorporation. Each party irrevocably agrees that the courts of IM IM’s country of incorporation shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with this Agreement or its subject matter or form ation.

Note: Once platform coordinator logs in for the test user and completes the validation, they can come back to the screen and change Access/Booth Type and continue the testing
Note: Click on Create Purchase Data and user will be redirected to login screen for that particular contact Access Type and Booth Type
NOTE: If your component is independent of Booth/Product Type, leave this blank and just click on “Save Selected”
NOTE: If you do not select any option, and click on “Save Selected” it will not show to anyone. Please click on “Select All and Save” to show it to all existing User Types.

Note: Selecting the Access Type in this step will look for related Test Data Contacts ex: Frank The Exhibitor, Frank The Agent and create related Contact Edition Mapping for the related Active Event Edition
NOTE: If you do not select any option, and click on “Save Selected and Next” it will not show to anyone. Please click on “Select All and Next” to show it to all existing User Types.
